name: Max Marketing Coach
tagline: Make Changes Today. Make Money Tomorrow.
description:
Max Marketing Coach offers you:
Assist or manage your Pay Per Click (PPC) campaigns
Review your website and provide suggestions
Help you develop a "marketing tool" website
Review your business operations
Improve your marketing
Improve your profits
Streamline your operation
Coach you to effectively compete
Max Marketing Coach packages include personal, one-on-one strategizing sessions that take place on a weekly schedule over a two to six month period of time.
